contents:
Trump offers encouragement: "The world is at war with a hidden enemy. WE WILL WIN!"

President Trump took to Twitter with encouraging words about the coronavirus: "WE WILL WIN!"

Trump "pinned" the tweet, which calls the coronavirus a "hidden enemy," to the top of his page.

The tweet follows the president's 15-day plan to "slow the spread" of the virus that has raced across the nation. There are currently more than 4,000 confirmed cases of the coronavirus and 75 deaths in the United States, and more than 167,000 cases and 6,600 deaths worldwide.


来源https://disrn.com/news/trump-the-world-is-at-war-with-a-hidden-enemy
以上是新闻报道
下面是来自国际友人的评论 来源https://www.tigerdroppings.com/rant/politics/trump--the-world-is-at-war-with-a-hidden-enemy--we-will-win/89111462/
高能警告
"The world is at war with a hidden enemy. WE WILL WIN!"
He talking about COVID-19 or something else?（这人估计有点糊涂）
他是在说COVID肺炎还是什么别的；
So far COVID is winning（好悲观）
目前看来肺炎快赢了；
